channel.title: Getting Started on Mesh Tool
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Mesh Tool

item.title: Basic
item.description: Introduction Mesh Tool is a code plugin for Unreal Engine 4. It allows you to create and edit mesh assets and prototype props and levels without leaving Unreal Editor. Install for Custom Engine Build The process should apply for installing any code plugin installation to a custom engine build. Download suitbale plugin version from Marketplace e.g. Download 4.25 version of the plugin if the custom engine build is a fork from 4.
